metadata.title: CVE-2021-30689 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue isfixed in tvOS 14.6, iOS 14.6 and iPadOS 14.6, Safari 14.1.1, macOS Big Sur11.4, watchOS 7.5. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead touniversal cross site scripting.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
